sentence.Network_en: The nematodicidal activity of 36 strains Paecilomyces and their allies agaist nematode Panagrellus redivivus was tested.
sentence.Network_cn: 用贵州大学真菌资源研究所分离保存的36株半知菌对全齿复活线虫Panagrellusredivivus的杀虫活性进行了测定.
